m_szDocTitle: Patent US20090112384 - Startup sequence control method of fuel cell-super capacitor hybrid electric ... - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: (b) Background Art [0005] A conventional fuel cell-battery hybrid electric vehicle allows a high-voltage DC-to-DC converter disposed between the fuel cell and the battery to compensate for a voltage difference between the fuel cell and the battery and perform the control of charge/discharge of the battery as well as the control of power of the fuel cell, thereby eliminating the necessity of a separate start-up control strategy for matching the voltages between the fuel cell and the battery. [0006] Also, a fuel cell-super capacitor hybrid electric vehicle employing the high-voltage DC-to-DC con
